title: Design For Culture & Identity
description:
Objective - This module will focus on the issues related to culture and identity and the design outcomes that may be generated.



Topics - The module will require students to acquire an understanding of the history and culture of people and place. It will include the study of traditions and symbolism associated with distinct communities of people.

This module is planned to essentially provide overseas and exchange students with the opportunity to study design within the cultural context of South East Asia.



Targeted Students - Industrial design students.
